original_text:
All who make idols are nothing,
    and the things they treasure are worthless.
Those who would speak up for them are blind;
    they are ignorant, to their own shame.
korean_text: 우상을 만드는 자는 다 허망하도다 그들이 원하는 것들은 무익한 것이거늘 그것들의 증인들은 보지도 못하며 알지도 못하니 그러므로 수치를 당하리라

sentences.original_text: All who make idols are nothing
and the things they treasure are worthless
Those who would speak up for them are blind
